r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * If XML_RPC_Message::getParam() is given an incorrect parameter, raise an error with the new XML_RPC_ERROR_INCORRECT_PARAMS code and return FALSE. * Handle improper requests to XML_RPC_Server::verifySignature(). Bug 4231. * Try to allow HTTP 100 responses if followed by a 200 response. Bug 4116. * Help Delphi users by making RPCMETHODNAME an alias for METHODNAME. Request 4205.
